List of Temperaments for future research
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Research on game mechanics: List of Temperaments for future research
By Lisa Shock on Friday, February 13, 2004 - 06:04 pm:

Harrabcat started making a list of temperaments, and thinks it may be useful, and could possibly inspire some research into how they affect monsters. So far, his list is a lot like the MR3 temperaments, but I have no idea if that's meaningful at all.

By Harrabcat on Friday, February 13, 2004 - 06:13 pm:

Ok Heres my list so far

High Pride
Serious
Not Serious
Normal
Nice
Cool
Passionate
Brave
Lazy
Hot Blooded
Timid
Spoiled
Cheerful

Thats it so far :(
